resources.string:
For Gucci Love Parade, classic styles are refashioned in contemporary silhouettes and mixed with eclectic references. Inspired by vintage silk scarves, the Interlocking G chain check print gives this dress a retro touch.
 - Ivory silk with Interlocking G chain check print
 - GG golden-toned buttons
 - Half lined
 - Short sleeves
 - Detachable belt with metal buckle
 - Front pockets
 - All-over pleated skirt
 - Hidden zip closure
 - Length: 37.4, based on a size 38 (IT)
 - Made in Italy
 - The product shown in this image is a size 38 (IT)
 - Fabric: 100% Silk.
 - Lining: 76% Acetate, 24% Silk.
